Futility UI

The Simple Web Framework

Futility UI is a lightweight toolkit for practical web development, usable as a website boilerplate, design system styleguide, or drop-in utility package.

The platform consists of these main parts:

CSS Framework

A minimalist, utility-based CSS schema, inspired by Bootstrap 4 and Tailwind.

Page Templates

Helpful starter pages showcasing typical web layouts, in .html and .ejs.

Simple Tooling

Dev server & build script for generating your own custom Futility site.

Putting it all together, #FUI is intended for any project seeking to craft a performant, bespoke design system. In fact, this page itself is built with Futility!
